pkgmetadata.longdescription: cue2toc is a free program for UNIX systems to convert CUE files to cdrdao's TOC format. Features include: support for complete set of CUE commands (e.g. catalog number, data and audio tracks, ISRC codes, CD-Text, Pre-/Postgaps (with zero data or data from file), subindexes etc.), automatic determination of session type and conversion of data files by user configurable commands based on file name extension matching.
